place_info.title: YLG Salon, Adyar

recent_reviews.snippet: Great service from Rohit.....He is doing a haircut what I need exactly....
Rohit sir did an amazing job in doing my layer cut. Thank you
Very happy and satisfied with service of nisha💯 thank you ylg

Came here for a Brazilian and man are they professional! I had my service done from beautician Tamilselvi. She’s so friendly and well accommodating. Didn’t let me feel uncomfortable for even a second. Loved it. HIGHLY RECOMMEND.
Gor hair coloring and hair cut for daughter's. Rohit was very patient and thorough. One of the best services. Than you ylg
Spa was good don by rohit he did a great job he was very patient liked the service
YLG become my recent addiction. They have amazing offers and lots of services. Best salon.

popular_reviews.snippet: I am a regular here for many years now. Their service levels are excellent. Shakuntala knows exactly what I want and makes it easier for me. My last visit was for my hair Coloring. I was attended to by Tamilselvi. She is one of the best i have come across so far. Take a look at my pic and you will know why I love her work.

Service 2: I got my first short haircut done here by Tamizhselvi on Feb 11, 2025. I was a bit concerned about the ouptut but trusted the process. Truely, It’s soo cute! Everyone complimented my haircut and I feel so confident now! Thank You! The service was highly professional. Even after hairwash the layers a well maintained. Will surely visit again 🥰

Service 1: My go to salon is YLG! Since 2019. Visited this outlet recently and the ambiance was just bright and amazing. Took hair spa as they had some good offer. The service was handled by Shakunthala who looked experienced and so kind. I was so comfortable while having the hairspa and head massage she did was quite calming. Also, I regularly trim my eyebrows here. Services are too good!

I’m so happy with my haircut and colour.The whole experience was fantastic from start to finish. The consultation was thorough, and I felt listened to and understood. The colour came out beautifully  exactly what I was hoping for,,and the cut suits me perfectly.Thank you so much Trishna for your fantastic work..

I had an amazing experience at YLG Adyar today. I took the following services - Absolute Repair Molecular Hair Spa (To fix my frizzy, weak hair with breakage), along with Bombini Pedicure and Japanese Blanch Facial. Staffs there suggested treatments based on my skin and hair type without any pressure to choose additional services. They are very professional with good knowledge in whatever service they do & thoroughly explained each process, which I really appreciate. Also their warm and welcoming hospitality made the experience even better! I highly recommend YLG—because at YLG “ You look great ! “
My first time here. Totally impressed with their service. Trishna did a nice job.
"I had an amazing experience at YLG! The atmosphere was so relaxing. A huge thank you to Mr. Rohit who truly done a good cut on my hair. I love the style. Definitely coming back!"
It was a nice experience at YLG. In Tuesdays they offer a 50 percent discount in a hair cut and hair spa. Overall , great experience.
